Comments.Message: Thank you! Do you plan to add the entire set of attributes, or only a few? Also, do let me know if you want me to help out?
At some point I had all of them but I guess graphviz keeps on adding them. I will fill the gap.
Added missing length. I'll add the missing properties later.
If you could look the list of missing attributes + type + default value, I could easily add them to QuickGraph. I'll close this issue.

Will do. I had a quick scan and you do have the basic properties (for about 90% of the use cases). I'll try out a few more .. e.g. the "image" attr for a vertex, the ability to source and embed an image. Will send over something as and when I use more of it.

Many thanks for the quick response. :)

cheers
